You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image depicts a city street scene during what appears to be either sunrise or sunset. In the foreground, there are several cars, including a yellow double-decker bus, driving on the road. The architecture is notable, with a large, historic-looking building featuring a green dome and a clock tower in the background. The building has classical architectural elements, such as columns and statues. To the left, there is a tall, modern office building with many windows. The sky is clear
